'''Brian Thompson''' is an American [[flow arts]] practitioner who taught club spinning [[Hybrid (flow arts)|hybrids]] at the [[Vulcan Lofts]] in Oakland, California. He co-developed the 24-Hybrid sequence and contributed to the [[Vulcan Tech Gospel]] and the [[Book of P.H.A.T.]].<ref name="lorq-about">{{cite web |url=https://sirlorq.wordpress.com/about-2/ |title=About |publisher=Sir Lorq}}</ref><ref name="phat">{{cite web |url=https://sirlorq.wordpress.com/tech-tiles/ |title=Vulcan Tech Gospel Book of P.H.A.T. Volume 1 |publisher=Sir Lorq}}</ref>

[[Lorq Nichols]] studied under Thompson during his visit to the Vulcan in Spring 2010.<ref name="lorq-about" />
